idea-plugin.name: Open the Iterated Files
idea-plugin.description: This plugin adds an action to PhpStorm that allows developers to quickly open all modified and new un-versioned files in the editor with a single click. It integrates with the VCS to identify files that have been changed or are not yet tracked by the version control system. This is particularly useful for reviewing changes before a commit or adding new files to the repository.

action.description: Opens all iterated (New/modified) files in a Git project
